feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-22T03:57:30.383234Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;Llama：添加基于语法的采样</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/ggerganov/llama.cpp/pull/1773</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T21 ：55：55.064024Z </更新>; <link href =“https://github.com/ggerganov/llama.cpp/pull/1773”/>; <作者>; <name>;davepeck</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=davepeck</uri>; </author>; <content type =“html”>;<img src =“https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/242054” 3/250365685-5bd15da2-78c1-4625-be90-1e938e6823f1.gif"样式="宽度：220像素；高度：110像素；" />;<br />;本文介绍了一个 API，它采用序列化的上下文无关语法来指导和约束采样。它还提供了一个类似 Backus-Naur 形式 (BNF) 的语法示例，用于指定生成的语法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#llama-add-grammar-based-sampling" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36819906" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在 Windows NT 网络配置中使用 Prolog (1996)</stitle>; <id>;https://web.archive.org/web/20030218034509/http://www.research.microsoft.com/research/dtg/davidhov/pap.htm</id>; <更新>;2023-07-22T00:55:55.310540Z</更新>; < link href="https://web.archive.org/web/20030218034509/http://www.research.microsoft.com/research/dtg/davidhov/pap.htm"/>; <author>; <name>;zdw</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zdw</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Microsoft 的 Windows NT 操作系统使用嵌入式 Prolog 解释器来配置其局域网和广域网系统。描述了解决管道问题的算法，包括其正向和负向约束、Prolog 数据库和效率考虑。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#using-prolog-in-windows-nt-network-configuration-1996" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36821871" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;员工对 Anchor Brewery 出价</stitle>; <id>;https://vinepair.com/booze-news/anchor-employees-brewery-takeover-bid/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T00:55:55.313873Z</updated>; <link href="https://vinepair.com/booze-news/anch or-employees-brewery-takeover-bid/"/>; <author>; <name>;selimthegrim</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=selimthegrim</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://vinepair.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/anchor-bottle-card-375x450.jpg" style="width: 220 像素；高度：264 像素；" />;<br />;在高管宣布这家历史悠久的旧金山公司将被关闭后，Anchor Brewing Co. 的员工表达了购买该啤酒厂并将其作为工人合作社经营的愿望。员工们要求有公平的机会继续工作并保持啤酒厂的运营。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#employees-bid-on-anchor-brewery" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36821861" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;将失败作为核心生活技能</stitle>; <id>;https://buildinghealthier.substack.com/p/confronting-failure-as-a-core-life</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T00:55:55.314789Z</updated>; <link href="https://buildinghealthier.substack.com/p/confronting-failure-as-a-core-life "/>; <author>; <name>;blh75</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=blh75</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_120,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaw s.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F627efde7-8e44-414c-9cf3-32ba9d1649c4_3223x4000.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：274px；" />;<br />;一年前，作者在旧金山工作，但现在他们在越南反思他们失败的数字健康公司。他们过去常常针对有关自己失败的问题制定类似营销活动的回应，但现在他们抓住了就此进行真诚对话的机会。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#confronting-failure-as-a-core-life-skill" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36784114" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;MiniZinc</stitle>; <id>;https://www.minizinc.org/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T18:55:55.315982Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.minizinc.org/"/>; <author>; <name>;gavi</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gavi</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.minizinc.org/MiniZn_logo.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;MiniZinc 是一种高级建模语言，可让您对约束满足和优化问题进行建模。它提供了一个大型的预定义约束库，可以编译成 FlatZinc，这是一种许多解算器都能理解的解算器输入语言。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#minizinc" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36817628" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Web 环境界面grity API提案</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/RupertBenWiser/Web-Environment-Integrity</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T18:55:55.316959Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/RupertBenWiser/Web-Environment-Integrity"/>; <author>; <name>;reactormonk</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=reactormonk</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/3e5746f7427e9d6ea003ffda42275633b139b5a896d712bbc80935e54957816b/RupertBenWiser/Web-En vironment-Integrity" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;此存储库详细介绍了添加新 API 以确定 Web 环境完整性的提案：<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#web-environment-integrity-api-proposal" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36817305" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;FBI 对美国参议员不当使用 702 监视权力</stitle>; <id>;https://thehill.com/homenews/administration/4110850-fbi-improperly-used-702-surveillance-powers-on-us-senator/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-2 2T02:55:55.318832Z</更新>; <link href="https://thehill.com/homenews/administration/4110850-fbi-improperly-used-702-surveillance-powers-on-us-senator/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ramblenode </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ramblenode</uri>; </作者>; <内容type="html">;<img src="https://i0.wp.com/thehill.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2023/07/AP910776172115-e1689375358323.jpg?w=2000&ssl=1" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;根据法庭记录，FBI 不当使用监视权力来搜索有关美国参议员、州议员和州法官的信息。外国情报监视法院 (FISC) 的意见中记录了 FBI 对《外国情报监视法》第 702 条的使用，这肯定会给情报界带来挑战。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fbi-im正确使用-702-surveillance-powers-on-us-senator" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36822654" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;男人老化厨房果蝇与恐怖小店</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.zaccohn.com/Fruitflies-and-the-Little-Shop-of-Horrors/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T22:55:55.320027Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.zaccohn.com/Fruitflies-and-the-Little-Shop-of-Ho rrors/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;zacharycohn </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zacharycohn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blog.zaccohn.com/images/blog_pitcherplants.jpeg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;每年夏天，作者的厨房尽管定期清洁，但还是被果蝇侵扰。他们尝试使用陷阱，但发现它们难看。然后他们发现了肉食性猪笼草，特别是紫猪笼草，它有效地控制了果蝇的数量。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#managing-kitchen-fruit-flies-with-a-little-shop-of-horrors" target="_blan k">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36820469" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;“最好的蓝莓”：一种微小的北美水果如何占领澳大利亚（2022）</stitle>; <id>;https:// www.theguardian.com/food/2022/oct/29/the-best-blueberry-how-a-tiny-north-american-fruit-took-over-australia</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T23:55:55.322527Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theguardian.com/food/2022/oct/29/the-best-blueberry -how-a-tiny-north-american-fruit-took-over-australia"/>; <作者>; <名称>;小牛</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=calf</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/b26d00b62f1ebbeb299aaa2647c209 a93f708c0c/0_203_6016_3610/master/6016.jpg?width=445&dpr=1&s=none" style="宽度：220px; height: 132px;" />;<br />;在澳大利亚培育的名为尤里卡 (Eureka) 的蓝莓品种荣获三星级高级口味奖。澳大利亚的蓝莓产量在过去五年中增加了两倍，而且几乎全年种植。蓝莓已成为需求量很大的流行超级食品。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-best-blueberry-how-a-tiny-north-american-fruit-took-over-austr alia-2022" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36797636" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Primo – 带有 Svelte 块的可视化 CMS，代码编辑器和 SSG</stitle>; <id>;https://primocms.org</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T12:55:55.323680Z</updated>; <link href="https://primocms.org"/>; <author>; <name>;mmmateo</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mmmateo</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src =“https://kdtzsoeklezpgshpzqtf.supabase.co/storage/v1/object/public/images/7c1dc1a3-c9eb-4364-b31b-951ecfc2641d/1682111950401Screen%20Shot%202023-04-21%20at%205.17.27%20PM .png"样式="宽度：220px； height: 122px;" />;<br />;邀请任意数量的协作者作为开发人员或内容编辑者并一起编辑您的页面。在单个服务器上创建无限数量的网站并在几秒钟内启动新网站。将您的网站部署到 Github 存储库。从那里您可以轻松地将其部署到任何网络主机。使用 Primo 的免费主题之一开始运行，并使用 CSS 变量在几秒钟内对其进行自定义。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn -primo-a-visual-cms-with-svelte-blocks-a-code-editor-and-ssg" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36813086" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;NativePHP：使用 PHP 构建桌面应用程序的框架</stitle>; <id>;https://nativephp.com/docs/1/getting-started/introduction</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T22:55:55.324637Z</updated>; <link href="https://nativephp.com/docs/1/getting-started/introduction"/>; <author>; <name>;brysonree ce</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=brysonreece</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;NativePHP 是一个新框架，用于使用 PHP 快速构建丰富的本机桌面应用程序。它使 PHP 开发人员能够使用熟悉的工具和技术创建跨平台的本机应用程序。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nativephp-a-framework-for-building-desktop-apps-using-php" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36820555" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;对于 BSD Unix，这是 Sayonara (1992)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.tech-insider.org/unix/research/1992/0622.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T18:55:55.325668Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.tech-insider.org/unix /research/1992/0622.html"/>; <author>; <name>;operator-name</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=operator-name</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;BSD Unix 的最终版本标志着加州大学伯克利分校参与操作系统业务的结束。 BSD Unix 自 1988 年以来因其无需许可费和尖端技术而在学术界广受欢迎。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#for-bsd-unix-it-s-sayon​​ara-1992" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36817482" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.beta cat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为了拯救地球，我们应该放慢速度吗？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.newyorker.com/news/daily-comment/to-save-the-planet-should-we-really-be-moving-slower</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T23:55:55.328332Z</updated>; <link href="https:// www.newyorker.com/news/daily-comment/to-save-the-planet-should-we-really-be-moving-slower"/>; <author>; <name>;laurex</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=laurex</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.newyorker.com/photos/649ee7259e 87508ed764df06/master/w_2560%2Cc_limit/McKibben_Degrowth.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：126px；" />;<br />;文章讨论了平均生活水平的历史增长以及利用煤炭、天然气和石油的影响。它还探讨了对增长的批评和去增长运动的出现，该运动主张减少消费并在地球的生物物理极限内生活。作者反思了构建绿色未来的可能性以及为绿色技术挖掘和构建足够资源的挑战。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#to-save-the-planet-should-we-be-moving-slower" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36821372" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;书评：交易法则</stitle>; <id>;https://astralcodexten.substack.com/p/your-book-review-the-laws-of-trading</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T21:55:55.329415Z</updated>; <link href="https://astralcodexten.substack.com/p/your-book- review-the-laws-of-trading"/>; <author>; <name>;feross</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=feross</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack -post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F4c83fb0a-dce8-47ca-9dd7-276236fa4a69_1200x742.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：137px；" />;<br />;奥古斯丁·勒布朗的《交易法则》是一本结合了交易、哲学和决策的独特书籍。勒布朗将金融市场视为一个竞争环境，参与者必须适应，否则就会死亡。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#book-review-the-laws-of-trading" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36820105" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;《魔兽世界》玩家欺骗 AI 抓取网站发布废话</stitle>; <id>;https://www.forbes.com/sites/paultassi/2023/07/21/world-of-warcraft-players-trick-ai-scraping-games-website-into-publishing-nonsense/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T16:55:55 .330345Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.forbes.com/sites/paultassi/2023/07/21/world-of-warcraft-players-trick-ai-scraping-games-website-into-publishing-nonsense/"/>; <作者>; <name>;mikhael</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mikhael</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/60405e99c4959a8b4cd30b0e/400x0.jpg?cropX1=0&cropX2=1080&cropY1=0&cropY2=1080" style="宽度：220px；高度：221px；" />;<br />;Reddit 魔兽世界子版块发现一个网站正在抓取他们的帖子并使用人工智能来生成文章。作为回应，Reddit 用户创建了一个关于游戏中不存在的功能的假帖子，并且该网站发布了一篇基于该帖子的文章。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#world-of-warcraft-players-trick-ai-scraping-website-into-publishing-nonsense" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36815744" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;TH3P4G3 Thunderbolt eGPU 坞站评测</stitle>; <id>;https://egpu.io/exp-gdc-th3p4g2-thunderbolt-gpu-dock-review/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T21:55:55.331665Z</updated>; <link href="https:// egpu.io/exp-gdc-th3p4g2-thunderbolt-gpu-dock-review/"/>; <author>; <name>;mvolfik</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mvolfik</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;TH3P4G2 是一款紧凑且功能齐全的 Thunderbolt eGPU 适配器，提供菊花链支持和现代 Thunderbolt 控制器。它是一体化 eGPU 扩展坞解决方案或定制 eGPU 外壳平台的绝佳选择。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#th3p4g3-thunderbolt-egpu-dock-review" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36820205" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;记者应对包括科学家在内的所有来源保持怀疑</stitle>; <id>;https://natesilver.substack.com/p/journalists-should-be-skeptical-of</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T20:55:55.335547Z</updated>; <link href="https://natesilver.substack.com/p/journalists- should-be-skeptical-of"/>; <作者>; <name>;amadeuspagel</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=amadeuspagel</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2F substack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F2e937c74-f2b6-478a-aa5d-c485635efa71_820x385.webp" style="宽度：220px；高度：104px；" />;<br />;一组科学家在《自然医学》杂志上发表了一篇关于 COVID-19 起源的论文，该论文与他们的真实信念相矛盾，并误导了公众。作者操纵媒体叙事，并受到职业影响和政治强烈反对的动机。记者应该对所有消息来源保持怀疑，包括科学家。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#journalists-should-be-be-be-sketical-of----------------------- >; </content>; </entry>; <条目xml：base =“ https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml”>; <Title type type type =“ text”>; rfc 9420 aka Mesidage Lease Leseral Security </stitle>; 5：55.336932Z </更新>; <link href =“ https://blog.phnx.im/rfc-9420-mls/”/>; <uname>; <Name>; g src =“ https://blog.phnx.im/content/images/size/w960/2023/07/header-mls-rfc.png“ style =” width：220px; height; height; height; height; 134px;'' />;<br />;消息层安全 (MLS) 协议以 RFC 9420 的形式发布，是第一个标准化且完全指定的端到端加密协议。它在可扩展性和效率方面对现有协议进行了改进。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#rfc-9420-aka-messaging-layer-security" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36815705" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;亚马逊正准备发射大量宽带卫星</stitle>; <id>;https://arstechnica.com/space/2023/07/amazon-is-getting-ready-to-launch-a-lot-of-broadband-satellites/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T01:55:55.338107Z</updated>; <link href=" https://arstechnica.com/space/2023/07/amazon-is-getting-ready-to-launch-a-lot-of-broadband-satellites/"/>; <author>; <name>;LinuxBender</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=LinuxBender</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-内容/上传/2023/07/kuiperprocessing-800x450.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;亚马逊计划每月为其柯伊伯星座建造和发射多达 80 颗卫星，这是一个价值 100 亿美元的网络，旨在提供全球互联网连接。该公司将在未来六个月内开始生产可运行的柯伊伯卫星，并宣布在美国宇航局肯尼迪航天中心建造卫星处理设施。亚马逊将在该设施上投资 1.2 亿美元，最多可同时容纳三个发布活动。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#amazon-is-getting-ready-to-launch-a-lot-of-broadband-satellites" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36822141" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Bfs 3.0：迄今为止最快的查找</stitle>; <id>;https://tavianator.com/2023/bfs_3.0.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T00:55:55.339302Z</updated>; <link href="https://tavianator.com/2023/bfs _3.0.html"/>; <author>; <name>;rurban</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rurban</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Bfs 3.0 是一个通过文件系统进行广度优先搜索的工具。新版本包括异步、并行目录遍历，使其比以前的版本和 GNU find 更高效、更快。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bfs-3-0-the-fastest-find-yet" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36783449" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Slackware Linux 发行版 30 岁了</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theregister.com/2023/07/20/slackware_turns_30/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T19:55:55.340271Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.theregister.com/2023/07/20/ slackware_turns_30/"/>; <作者>; <name>;akoster</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=akoster</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://regmedia.co.uk/2023/07/19/slack-15-boot.png?x=648&y=360&infer_y=1" style="width: 220 px；高度：123px；" />;<br />;Slackware Linux 项目正在庆祝其成立 30 周年。它是仍在积极维护和开发的最古老的 Linux 发行版。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#slackware-linux-distribution-turns-30-years-old" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36818233" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.beta cat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;FreeWilly 1 和 2，两个新的开放获取法学硕士</stitle>; <id>;https://stability.ai/blog/freewilly-large-instruction-fine-tuned-models</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T20:55:55.341342Z</updated>; <link href="https://stability.ai/blog/freewilly-large-instruct ion-fine-tuned-models"/>; <作者>; <名称>;anigbrowl</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=anigbrowl</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/6213c340453c3f502425776e/29202f99-d2d9 -412f-8aeb-f2881514b920/Arcane_magic_with_an_orca_whale_swimming_in_the_galaxy_filled_with_vibrant_stars_steps-40_style-Pixel_Art_seed-0ts-1689963125_idx-0.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：221px；" />;<br />;Stability AI 及其 CarperAI 实验室发布了 FreeWilly1 和 FreeWilly2，这两个新的开放访问大型语言模型 (LLM) 展示了卓越的推理能力。这些模型是在非商业许可下发布的研究实验。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#freewilly-1-and-2-two-new-open-access-llms" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36818923" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我用 Rust 编写了一个 JVM</stitle>; <id>;https://andreabergia.com/blog/2023/07/i-have-writing-a-jvm-in-rust/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T08:55:55.342465Z</updated>; <link href="https://andreabergia.com/blog/2023/07 /i-have-writing-a-jvm-in-rust/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;lukastyrychtr</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lukastyrychtr</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://andreabergia.com/images/2023/07/gc1.png" style="width: 220px; height: 103像素；” />;<br />;我用 Rust 编写了一个 Java 虚拟机，称为 rjvm。它是一个出于学习目的而构建的玩具 JVM，而不是一个严肃的实现。它支持执行字节码指令、处理局部变量和堆栈元素以及调用方法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-have-writing-a-jvm-in-rust" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36811554" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;不要取笑著名的丹·布朗 (2013)</stitle>; <id>;https://onehundredpages.wordpress.com/2013/06/12/dont-make-fun-of-renowned-dan-brown/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T19:55:55.344053Z</updated>; <link href="https://onehundredpage s.wordpress.com/2013/06/12/dont-make-fun-of-renowned-dan-brown/"/>; <author>; <name>;codetrotter</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=codetrotter</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;著名作家 Dan Brown 愤怒地醒来，因为他知道他的新书将受到评论家的攻击。尽管受到批评，他的经纪人还是让他放心，并意识到他数以百万计的粉丝和财富比少数批评者的意见更重要。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#dont-make-fun-of-renowned-dan-brown-2013" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36818501" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;IMAX 模拟 PalmPilot 软件为 Oppenheimer 的 70 毫米版本提供动力</stitle>; <id>;https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2023/07/imax-emulates-palmpilot-software-to-power-oppenheimers-70-mm-release/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T18:55:55。 346226Z</更新>; <link href="https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2023/07/imax-emulates-palmpilot-software-to-power-oppenheimers-70-mm-release/"/>; <作者>; <name>;riffraff</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=riffraff</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/oppenheimer-800x362.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：100px；" />;<br />;IMAX 发布了 70 毫米格式的电影《奥本海默》，这是自 2020 年《信条》以来首部 70 毫米 IMAX 电影。该电影在 PalmPilot 模拟器上运行，特别是 Palm m130，它被用作运行 70 毫米电影的控制器。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#imax-emulates-palmpilot-software-to-power-oppenheimers-70-mm-release" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36817900" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
